title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 02, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 02, 2020
description:
On today's episode of the DP Show, DP recaps last night's action in sports. Is it time for the Jets to forget this season and start the Tank for Trevor Lawrence? Who can beat the Dodgers if Clayton Kershaw continues to pitch like he did last night? We're joined by Good Morning Football's Peter Schrager and Actor/Comedian/Producer Adam Sandler. Which one of the Danettes did he offer a role in one of his next movies to?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's episode of the DP Show, DP recaps last night's action in sports. Is it time for the Jets to forget this season and start the Tank for Trevor Lawrence? Who can beat the Dodgers if Clayton Kershaw continues to pitch like he did last night? We're joined by Good Morning Football's Peter Schrager and Actor/Comedian/Producer Adam Sandler. Which one of the Danettes did he offer a role in one of his next movies to?
